Unit test class for verifying the functionality of the ProgramCompoundCommand class.

public class ProgramCompoundCommandTests

Remarks

This class contains tests to ensure that the ProgramCompoundCommand handles compound commands correctly, allowing multiple commands to be grouped and executed as a single entity. The tests validate the creation, parsing, and execution of compound commands under various scenarios.
